reference.title: TR-31 key block header and optional block data

titlealts.navtitle: TR-31 key header and optional data
titlealts.searchtitle: (): TR-31 key block header and optional block data

keywords.indexterm: TR-31key block header and optional block data

refbody.section: Available services for TR-31 symmetric-key management and the use of TR-31 key blocks are described in . This section describes the format of the TR-31 key block header and the header values supported by . It also describes the TR-31 optional blocks that can be used by . See ASC X9 TR 31-2018: Interoperable Secure Key Exchange Block Specification for the definition of a TR-31 key block.
